steps.name: Detection of Liquidation Opportunity
steps.content: When changes occur in protocol prices or interest, indicating a borrower might be in trouble, a system checks if liquidation is possible.

steps.name: Moving Collateral to Cover Debt
steps.content: The ownership of borrower's collateral is transferred to the protocol to cover the debt of the borrower.

steps.name: Liquidators
steps.content: In case the protocol's reserves drop sufficiently and they are unable to pay off the debt of the borrower then it creates an opportunity for liquidators.

steps.name: Completing Transactions
steps.content: Funds are provided by the liquidator to purchase the discounted collateral.
